name: Long Pelican Cameo Necklace
description:
Pelican cut out of an oval pendant. My good friend said it reminded her of a cameo. :)

I've suspended this from a long 30" chain. Perfect for layering.

♥ Dimensions of charm: 20mm x 16mm
♥ Total length of necklace as shown: 30"
♥ 14k gold, rose gold or silver plated stainless steel charm
♥ 14k gold filled, rose gold filled or sterling silver chain

name: Necklace for a Cause - Dog Bone Necklace
description:
Beau & Stella is named after my two rescue dogs. It is because of them that I have designed this necklace. A portion of the proceeds from the sale of this necklace will go to local animal shelters, including P.A.W.S., the shelter that I rescued Beau from after Hurricane Katrina.

The ends of the bone are tiny hearts. ♥ 

♥ Dimensions of charm: 22mm x 6mm
♥ Total length of necklace: 17"
♥ 14k gold plated stainless steel charm
♥ 14k gold filled chain

name: Tiny Sideways Fleur de Lis Necklace
description:
The Fleur de Lis is an ubiquitous symbol of New Orleans and Louisiana culture and heritage. I wanted to do my own take on the iconic design so I rotated it slightly for a unique aesthetic and of course made is super tiny and light.

I've drawn a tiny fleur de lis that is then cut from stainless steel and plated in the metal of your choice.

♥ Dimensions of charm: 12mm x 12mm
♥ Total length of necklace as shown: 16"
♥ 14k gold, rose gold or silver plated stainless steel charm
♥ 14k gold filled, rose gold filled or sterling silver chain

name: Tiny Pineapple Necklace
description:
Did you know that the Pineapple is considered the fruit of welcome? To many, it represents warmth, friendship, and hospitality.

This sweet necklace is super cute and lightweight.

I've drawn a tiny pineapple that is then cut from stainless steel and plated in the metal of your choice.

♥ Dimensions of charm: 15mm x 8mm
♥ Total length of necklace as shown: 16"
♥ 14k gold, rose gold or silver plated stainless steel charm
♥ 14k gold filled, rose gold filled or sterling silver chain

name: Tiny Luck Necklace
description:
♥ The Luck Necklace is now available in an adorably tiny size! ♥ 

Now who doesnt need a little luck now and then?

This necklace is tiny, understated and unique. I've formed an organicly shaped horseshoe out of gold filled/sterling silver wire and hammered it for strength. I fastened it to a delicate chain using gold filled/sterling silver wire. The result is a necklace that can be worn alone or layered and I hope will bring good things your way!

Your Luck Necklace will be handmade to order, so expect some minor variations....yours will be a one-of-a-kind!

♥ Approximate diameter of horseshoe: 3/8"
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, just let me know at checkout.
♥ All components gold filled/sterling silver
♥ Rose Gold version - rose gold plated sterling silver chain and clasp, Rose gold filled horseshoe and wire wrapping
♥ Also available in larger size - check my shop!

name: New Orleans Mississippi River Necklace
description:
New Orleans gets it's nickname 'The Crescent City' from the crescent shape that the Mississippi River makes at New Orleans.

I used a map to draw the outline of this iconic bend in the river. The river is then cut from stainless steel and plated in 14k gold, rose gold, and silver. 

♥ Dimensions of charm: 35mm x 15mm (1-3/8" x 5/8")
♥ Total length of necklace as shown: 18"
♥ 14k gold, rose gold or silver plated stainless steel charm
♥ 14k gold filled, rose gold filled or sterling silver chain

name: Moroccan Necklace - Small
description:
This design began as a request from one of my amazing customers. I loved the idea so much, I decided to offer it to everyone!

I've drawn a quatrefoil design that is then cut from stainless steel and plated in 14k gold, rose gold, or silver. I have used very heavy plating - 2.5 microns which is the same plating thickness used in 'vermeil'. The necklace as shown is 16".

Larger size available here:
http://www.beauandstella.com/product/quatrefoil-necklace-large

♥ Dimensions of charm: 13mm x 13mm
♥ Total length of necklace as shown: 16"

name: Anchor Necklace
description:
I've designed this simple anchor with a slight bend in it. This feature adds a unique touch as well as helps weight it so it will not flip when worn. This necklace is perfect for water lovers as well as anyone who is rocking the nautical look.

I've designed and drawn a delicate curved anchor charm. It is then cut from stainless steel and plated in rose gold, 14k gold or silver. I have used very heavy plating - 2.5 microns which is the same plating thickness used in 'vermeil'.

You may choose your metal preference from the drop down menu.

♥ Dimensions of charm: 17mm x 10mm

name: Tiny Hammered Initial Necklace
description:
I made this necklace custom for one of my wonderful customers and think it turned out so adorably I had to share!

I've hammered a tiny 3/8" diameter (10mm) gold filled disc to dimpled perfection, hand stamped an initial on it, tumbled it for hours for strength and shine, and then hung it from a delicate gold filled chain. It hits at the hollow of the neck as an understated glistening little coin. Uppercase and lowercase (shown in last image) letters, as well as numbers and an ampersand (&) available. Please make a note at checkout with your preference.

*Rose Gold Filled disc is brass on back of disc (facing skin) and rose gold on the front.

♥ Diameter of disc: 3/8" (10mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ Make a note at checkout with preferred letter - uppercase or lowercase
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, just let me know at checkout.
♥ All components gold filled/sterling silver

name: New Orleans Water Meter Necklace
description:
Beau & Stella's version of the classic New Orleans Water Meter Necklace!

I've custom designed an almost replica of the water meter (took some artistic license to highlight it's best features) and had it cast into a steel stamp so that it can be imprinted on metal. I then cut out a 1/2" (12mm) disc from a sheet of gold filledor sterling silver metal, and stamp the surface to leave the imprint of the water meter. The result is a delicate, feminine, understated homage to the great city of New Orleans. Wear it to show your love for the crescent city or just to remind you of the city that will always have a place in your heart.

This disc comes on an 18" gold filled or sterling silver chain. I can adjust the length if desired, just make a note at checkout.

♥ Diameter of disc: 1/2" (12mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 18"
♥ All components 14k gold filled or sterling silver

name: Long Gold Filled Circles Necklace
description:
I made this necklace as a custom order for a wonderful customer, and loved it so much I had to share!

I've suspended six equally spaced small gold filled circles from gold filled chain. This can also just be worn without doubling for a long necklace. The total length is 46".

♥ Diamter of circles: 3/8" (10mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 46"
♥ All components gold filled/sterling silver

name: Linked Together Necklace
description:
Linked Together Necklace - Mixed Metal - Three Tiny Mixed Metal Interlocking Links on Delicate Chain

Sweet, classic and versatile.

This feminine necklace is easy to wear and makes a great everyday piece. I like to think of this necklace as reminder and celebration of our connections to eachother. It can represent friends, family or community and the love that binds us together.

I've interlocked a gold filled, a rose gold vermeil and a sterling silver link and suspended them from delicate gold filled chain. The tiny delicate bands added to each link hints at an industrial edge to the otherwise feminine design. While adding interest and detail, it also provides support, substance and durability to the design.

If you'd prefer all one metal, or a sterling silver chain, just make a note at checkout. Rose gold vermeil chain will add to the price, so contact me prior to purchase for a quote.

♥ Diamter of links: 1/4" (7mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, please select length or make a note at checkout
♥ Gold Filled Chain, gold filled, rose gold vermeil and sterling silver links

name: Three Sisters Necklace
description:
Feminine. Simple. Sweet.

This necklace is understated enough for everyday wear, but shiny and feminine enough to dress up a casual outfit. The 3/8" (10mm) hammered gold discs catch the light in an amazing way and hang effortlessly from a delicate gold filled chain.

If you like the small hammered gold filled discs, be sure to check my shop for several similiar styles of necklace and earrings...as well as some sterling silver options.

♥ Diamter of circles: 3/8" (10mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, just let me know at checkout.
♥ All components gold filled

name: Everyday Necklace
description:
The Everyday Necklace is a unique everyday necklace that looks great alone or layered with other necklaces.

I've hammered a piece of sterling silver/gold filled wire to about 1-1/2" in length and fastened it to a delicate chain using sterling silver wire.

Your Everyday Necklace will be made special for you, so expect some minor variations. (Yours will be one-of-a-kind!!)


♥ Approximate length of 'twig': 1-1/2" (39mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, just let me know at checkout.
♥ All components sterling silver/gold filled

name: Personalized Initial Layered Circles Necklace
description:
** The Layered Circles Necklace is now able to be personalized - please let me know the letter you desire at checkout **

A perfect simple necklace great for layering or wearing alone.

The Layered Circles necklace is comprised of two uniquely textured gold filled circles layered together. The larger circle is lightly sanded to create a soft brushed finish. The smaller circle is hammered to catch the light in its dimples and create winks of light similiar to sunlight on rippled water. I've finished off the smaller circle by adding a hand stamped initial. I've hung it from an 18" chain - the perfect length for layering with 16" necklaces, or for wearing with your scoop neck and v-neck tops. 

♥ Diamter of circles: 11/16" (18mm) & 3/8" (10mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 18"
♥ Please specify letter in 'message to seller' at checkout.
♥ All components gold filled/sterling silver

name: Tiny Interlocking Links Necklace
description:
This necklace is tiny, understated and super feminine. It is so effortless and easy to wear...you forget you even have it on. Since its introduction to the Beau & Stella line, this necklace has been used to represent many different things for each person: a bond between two best friends, the unending love of a couple or even just the evolving relationship we have with ourselves.

I've interlocked two gold filled links and suspended them from delicate gold filled chain. The tiny delicate band added to the link hints at an industrial edge to the otherwise feminine design. While adding interest and detail, it also provides support, substance and durability to the design.

♥ Diamter of links: 1/4" (7mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 16", 18"
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, just make a note at checkout.
♥ All components gold filled/sterling silver

name: Beach Day Necklace
description:
I've simply hammered a small 1/2" diamter (13mm) gold filled/sterling silver disc to dimpled perfection and hung it from a delicate chain. I've named it the Beach Day because the disc is so reflective and catches the light in such an amazing way, it reminds me of the ocean.

♥ Diameter of disc: 1/2" (13mm)
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ Total length of necklace can be modified if desired, just let me know at checkout

name: Luck Necklace
description:
Now who doesnt need a little luck now and then? This necklace is simple, understated and unique. This piece has been a staple in the Beau & Stella collection since its inception in 2008.

I hand form and shape a horseshoe out of gold filled or sterling silver wire and then hammer it for texture and hardness. I then fasten it to a delicate chain by carefully wrapping a thin guage sterling silver or gold filled wire around the horseshoe. The result is a necklace that can be worn alone or layered and I hope will bring good things your way!

Your Luck Necklace will be handmade to order, so expect some minor variations....yours will be a one-of-a-kind!

This necklace is made standard at 16", but can be modified if desired. Just make a note of it at checkout.

name: Personalized Initial Necklace
description:
Personalize your wardrobe! 

This necklace is a simple base piece - great alone or a good base to layer from. The mid-length (18") makes it perfect to wear with a shorter piece as well as longer pieces. This also looks great alone for a simple finish to a vneck tshirt and jeans. Best part? It has your initial so your friends/sisters can't steal it! 

This necklace also makes a great gift for bridesmaids.

*Rose Gold Filled disc is rose gold on front and brass on back (facing skin)

I've suspended a hand stamped gold filled disc from gold filled chain. Let me know the letter you'd like at checkout. 

♥ Diameter of disc: 1/2" (12mm)
♥ Total length of necklace as shown: 18"
♥ All components gold filled, rose gold filled or sterling silver
♥ Let me know letter you'd like at checkout.

name: Tuesday Necklace
description:
The Tuesday Necklace is the necklace for when you dont want to have to think too hard about what to wear..it goes with everything. You can layer it with other pieces when you're looking for a more styled look, or wear it alone. I've hammered a circle and fastened it to a delicate  chain by carefully wire wrapping the link. Total length is 16" - but can be modified if desired, just let me know in the 'message to seller' at checkout.

*Rose Gold Vermeil link has a soft matte finish.

♥ Diamter of link: 10mm (less than 1/2")
♥ Total length of necklace: 16"
♥ All components sterling silver/gold filled/rose gold vermeil

name: Chain Extender
description:
Chain Extender
- up to 3" of extra length

name: Rose Gold Vermeil Extra Chain
description: Each additional inch after the advertised length on the necklace is $0.90. You may add as many inches to your cart as desired to increase the length of your Rose Gold Vermeil necklace.

name: Gold Filled Extra Chain Length
description:
Lengths up to 20" on any gold filled or sterling silver necklace can be accomodated at no extra charge. You may simply make a note at checkout with the length you'd like. If you desire a length over 20", please use this listing to purchase additional length.

Each additional inch after 20" is $0.50. You may add as many inches to your cart as desired to increase the length of your gold filled necklace. 

Ex: You desire the Tiny Luck Necklace at 30". Please add a quantity of (10) to your cart.
